item.title: A Comprehensive Note about Proxy Settings
item.description:
Git

> cat ~/.gitconfig
[http]
	proxy = socks5://[host]:[port]
[https]
	proxy = socks5://[host]:[port]

Curl (Homebrew)

> cat ~/.curlrc
socks5 = "[host]:[port]"

GAE

  1. Set proxy

    export HTTP_PROXY http://[host]:[port]
export HTTPS_PROXY http://[host]:[port]

  2. Delete cacerts.txt under GAE SDK installation to disable SSL verification ( make sure the proxy is safe before this step).

  3. Deploy.

    appcfg.py . --email=[address] --passin

item.title: How to "go get" Behind a Proxy
item.description:
Proxy for “go get”

https_proxy=http://user:pass@proxy_host:port go get ...

Proxy for Git

In $HOME/.gitconfig:

[https]
	proxy = proxy_url

Proxy for Mercurial

In $HOME/.hgrc:

[http_proxy]
host = host:port
user = ...
passwd = ...
